creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
description: Dark-skinned man wearing a turban and a red robe, holding a dagger; reclining woman in gold, white and red gown with stab wound on her PR breast; heavy red curtain and draperies
marks: Signature and Date LLC, in brown: [Tony Johannot . 1829]
medium: Watercolor with gum arabic and heightening
title: Leila, Hassan and the Giaour
